itunes:title: Joshua Week 4 with Jada Edwards
title: Joshua Week 4 with Jada Edwards
description:
It's week four of Lent and the final week of our Joshua series! Raechel and Amanda catch up with author, Bible teacher, and returning guest Jada Edwards. Together, they read the beautiful conclusion to Joshua’s story, where we watch God fulfill His promises to the Israelites. As the three friends talk about everything from leadership and covenants to sewer grates in the Holy Land, they offer us this comforting truth: God is always faithful to His people, and because of this, we can joyfully remember and proclaim His work in our lives. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 4 of the She Reads Truth Joshua reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Joshua collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/joshua-week-4-with-jada-edwards
